ssltools.name: ssltools
ssltools.description: Bash scripts to analyze, troubleshoot and inspect SSL certificates

additional.information:
A bunch of Bash tools to analyze, troubleshoot or inspect SSL certificates, requests or keys: 



* [sslcsr](https://github.com/frdmn/ssltools#sslcsr) - simple decypher and parse informations out a CSR (Certificate Sign Request)

* [sslhost](https://github.com/frdmn/ssltools#sslhost) - get renewal informations and the CRT (certificate) itself based on a host
